Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete customer area (Mein Konto) with D1 database backend

Features:
- Cloudflare D1 database with customers, sessions, addresses tables
- 7 REST API endpoints for authentication and customer management
- Customer registration and login with secure password hashing
- Session management with JWT-like tokens (30 days expiry)
- Complete customer dashboard with profile editing
- Order history from Shopify API
- Pflegebox form submissions history
- Responsive design matching existing Pflegebox form style
- Activity logs for audit trail

Backend (Worker):
- POST /api/customers/register - Register new customer
- POST /api/customers/login - Login with email/password
- GET /api/customers/me - Get customer profile
- PUT /api/customers/me - Update customer profile
- POST /api/customers/logout - Logout
- GET /api/customers/me/orders - Get Shopify orders
- GET /api/customers/me/pflegebox - Get Pflegebox submissions

Frontend:
- templates/page.area-clienti.liquid - Complete customer area page
- Login/Registration tabs with password toggle
- Dashboard with statistics (orders, Pflegebox, status)
- Profile editing form (name, address, Pflegegrad, phone)
- Sidebar navigation (Dashboard, Profil, Bestellungen, Pflegebox)
- Session management with localStorage
- Loading states and error handling
- Mobile responsive design

Database:
- database-schema.sql - Complete D1 schema
- Tables: customers, sessions, password_resets, addresses, activity_logs
- Indexes for performance
- View for customer stats

Documentation:
- PIANO_REGISTRAZIONE_CLIENTI.md - Complete implementation plan

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
